name: Elteria Hunter
description:
Elteria Hunter

The world of Elteria is a world full of magic and monsters, and it's a dangerous world for an average human. That's why the humans created a guild full of hunters to take down these monsters and keep peace in the world. But humans are not alone in this world. There are gods and demons too. Seven gods control one part of the world, and above them, there is an elemental dragon lord who keeps them in line so that they don't start a war. But it has been a thousand years since the death of the Dragonlord, but it's not the end yet. There will be a new Dragonlord.



The main focus in-game is following the story towards the stronger monsters.

And with this, you will be mainly focusing on crafting and quest to fight monsters and epic bosses.

There will be a lot of different types of mechanics in the game to make your party very strong and make your one playstyle.

In the early stage, the game will not be too hard, and it makes it easy to get the hang of the game, but after the mid-story, the game will get more complex, and you will need to have good gear, or else you will die.

Buying This, you will receive the base game right now, going into early access, so the game will only grow towards his full release.

The base game includes right now (more coming with future updates):

  • Story Quest.
  • Side Quest.
  • Dungeons.
  • Craft system.
  • Merchant system.
  • Guild System.
